about_the_game:
Manipulate time to overcome obstacles in a clever way. A sci-fi FPS game with large variety of weapons and foes set in a remote military research lab where an experiment has gone horribly wrong.

Story
As a retired special military operative, you set out on the adventure to find a handheld time manipulation device, which is rumored to have been lost from a closed military research lab deep in the middle of nowhere.

Features
  • Instantly travel between timelines to change the environment and overcome obstacles
  • Equip 8 unique weapons and gadgets for every combat situation
  • Explore atmospheric and interactable environments
  • 6 unique biomes: from Siberian mountains to space
  • Fight against a large variety of enemies

content_descriptors.notes: Blood coming out of the enemies, spooky monsters

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest MacOS version
  • Processor: Intel-based processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest MacOS version
  • Processor: Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

name: TIMESTRIDE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4-core / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6-core / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Manipulate time to overcome obstacles in a clever way. A sci-fi FPS game with large variety of weapons and foes set in a remote military research lab where an experiment has gone horribly wrong.
